name: chair1
description: A chair is a piece of furniture designed for sitting, typically featuring a seat, four legs, a backrest, and sometimes armrests. Chairs come in various styles, materials, and designs to serve different purposes, from simple wooden dining chairs to ergonomic office chairs with adjustable features.
